title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6653.9 - Applications for funding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6653.9 - Applications for funding

State Regulations
(a) In order to receive funds under this

Chapter, an area agency which has submitted an area plan must apply, on forms
prescribed by the office: (1)
for OAA
supportive services (title III-B) funding, at least 30 days prior to the
beginning of the area agency's program period; (2)
for OAA nutrition services (title III-C)
funding, at least 30 days prior to the beginning of the area agency's program
period; (3)
if the area agency
participates in CSE, for CSE planning and implementation and services funding
by January 1st of the year to which the application applies; and
(4)
if the area agency participates in EISEP, for EISEP planning, implementation and services funding by January 1st of the
year to which the application applies, provided that such applications may also
be submitted by January 20, 1987 for State fiscal year 1986-87 (except that the
office may waive such deadlines for good cause). (b) The office approves such applications if
they comply with an approved area plan and contain such additional information
as the office may require. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6653.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
